Filipe Fernandes • Front-end Developer and Founder at Choco la Design
  • Me
  • My work

My name is Filipe Fernandes am a dad, husband, Designer and Front-end Developer with over 6 years of work experience based in Dublin.

I love simplicity. Great ideas, awesome designs, remarkable moments, all those things are based on a simple thought.

My name is Filipe Fernandes and am a dad, husband, front-end developer & founder at Choco la Design. I started working as a designer in 2003 and as front-end in 2005 as a freelancer.

I provided consultancy to government agencies in Brazil like the Ministry of Health and Supreme Court about front-end architecture and UI design.

In 2010 I founded Choco la Design. It's a website where me and my contributors talk about design, helping our readers understand more about theory, technique and the market itself sharing our experiences.

Service Design Sprints

Is a global open community of service designers and enthusiasts of service design. We certify designers as sprint masters and provide them with the business connections and tools they need to start a practice from scratch, anywhere on the globe.

Choco la Design
